citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors).
citations.narrative:
Three expired medications (metronidazole Exp 2/23, oxytocin Exp Apr 2023, and an oral calcium solution Exp Aug 2023)
were in storage and per the facility representative used since the expiration dates. Expired medications might not have
the intended effect on animals or could make them sick. Ensure expired medications are not stored and not used in
regulated animals.
***Correct by 10/3/2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.40(b)(2) 
   
Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors). 
Three expired medications (metronidazole Exp 2/23, oxytocin Exp Apr 2023, and an oral calcium solution Exp Aug 2023) 
were in storage and per the facility representative used since the expiration dates. Expired medications might not have 
the intended effect on animals or could make them sick. Ensure expired medications are not stored and not used in 
regulated animals. 
***Correct by 10/3/2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. 
 
 n
